sense.def:
To explain something
pomeni navesti podrobnosti o nečem, da je tisto mogoče razumeti.

seg.quote: John went on to explain the legal situation.
I explained that I was trying to write a book.

sense.def:
To explain something that has happened
pomeni povedati razloge za nekaj, kar se je zgodilo.

seg.quote: He never wrote to me to explain his decision.
